message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this budget?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm willing to negotiate, I can't go lower than $13,000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
